page.title: 11Local Attractions: sport
page.content: {football and rugby:} Blackburn R.U.F.C Ramsgreave Drive. Old Blackburnians Association F.C Lammack Road. Pleckgate Playing Fields. Woolridge Playing fields.Both off Pleckgate Road. Young Mens Christian Association at Mellor. {cricket: } Blackburn Northern Cricket and Tennis Club. Woolridge Playing fields. Both off Pleckgate Road. {tennis:} Blackburn Northern off Pleckgate Road. Corporation Park off Revidge Road. {Squash:} Blackburn Northern off Pleckgate Road {Bowls:} Coporation Park off Revidge Road. {Golf:} Blackburn Golf Club off Revidge Road
